agentAbility.name: Hunter's Mark
agentAbility.description: Identify weaknesses in opponents. After activation, looking at any tank will reveal the location of its critical modules to both Hound and his team. Aiming at any revealed critical zone and penetrating the tank is enough to hit it while Hunter's Mark is on the opponent. Critical damage on a Marked tank will extend the effect's duration.

primaryAttack.name: Single Shot
primaryAttack.description: Requires reload after each shot, most accurate when stationary.

tankAbilities.name: Decoy
tankAbilities.description: Deploys a decoy identical to the tank, mimicking health and damage taken. The decoy is destroyed upon taking damage, healing the vehicle in the process.

tankAbilities.name: Trapping Shot
tankAbilities.description: Using a larger targeting area to mark a position for launching explosive devices. The smaller devices are spread across the area and trigger upon impact with the ground, causing a series of small explosions. Tracks are particularly vulnerable to this effect, making it an effective tool for immobilizing groups of opponents.
